blocks.name: getAllSingleItems
blocks.description: Retrieve an array of all Single Items.

args.name: pageSize
args.info: Number of the results at the page

args.name: sortOrder
args.info: Sort order. Possible values: DESC(default), ASC

args.name: titleFilterOperation
args.info: This keyword will allow you to filter by your title, regardless if it has been renamed. If was renamed, you can additionally use that name. Possible values: $equals, $not, $contains, $startsWith, $endsWith, $lessThan, $lessThanOrEqual, $greaterThan, $greaterThanOrEqual

args.name: priceFilterOperation
args.info: This keyword will allow you to filter by your price. Possible values: $equals, $lessThan, $lessThanOrEqual, $greaterThan, $greaterThanOrEqual

args.name: timestampUpdatedFilterOperation
args.info: This keyword will allow you to filter by update timestamp. Possible values: $lessThan, $greaterThan

args.name: timestampUpdatedFilterContent
args.info: Content of the update timestamp filter

args.name: timestampPublishedFilterOperation
args.info: This keyword will allow you to filter by create timestamp. Possible values: $lessThan, $greaterThan

args.name: timestampPublishedFilterContent
args.info: Content of the create timestamp filter

args.name: editionFilterOperation
args.info: This keyword will allow you to filter by edition. Possible values: $equals, $startsWith, $endsWith, $not

args.name: authorsIdList
args.info: Ids of authors (can accept string or array)

blocks.name: getSpecificSingleItem
blocks.description: Retrieve a Single Item by slug.
